E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1993
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are happy that you acquired Dwight Gooden.
The overall fan interest increases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Saturday, 4/8/1993
Subject: Good Game
Hello,
The fact that we won on a promotion day seems
to have a positive effect on our fan interest!
It increased slightly.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Randy Ready



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Jose Lima
Dear Sir,
Jose Lima is doing pretty good at A Mobile Bay Bears!
He has an ERA of 1.76, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/11/1993
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Kevin Tapani
